name: Awesome Reckless Car Driving Stunts - Free Racing
name_original: Awesome Reckless Car Driving Stunts - Free Racing
description:
Introducing Action Reckless Car Hero Stunts, where you can race your friends in a thrilling chase through the city! Choose from six different vehicles to race by yourself or against your friends!

Game features also include:
-High-def retina display graphics!
-Highly addictive gameplay that lasts hours and hours!
-In-game power-ups to gain competitive edge!
-Multiple levels designed to challenge the gamer!
-Awesome tricks designed for each car!

Don't wait now, it's time to download today!
